akn:section.akn:heading: Grants to improve supply, stability, safety, and training of agricultural labor force

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Definition of eligible entity In this section, the term “eligible entity” means an entity described in section 2008q(a) 11 See References in Text note below. of this title.
(c) Limitation on administrative expenses Not more than 15 percent of the funds made available to carry out this section for a fiscal year may be used to pay for administrative expenses.
(d) Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated to carry out this section—
